hero.backgroundAlt: Luxury limousine on Passeig de Gràcia
hero.heading: BEYOND LUXURY. SINCE 1940.
hero.subheading: From Barcelona to the world. VIP services with over 80 years of legacy.

legacy.heading: A legacy of excellence since 1940
legacy.subheading: More than eight decades of exclusive service throughout Spain.

tradition.title: Tradition and Prestige
tradition.description: Founded in 1940, Dachs Limousines is synonymous with luxury and trust in private transport.

fleet.title: Impeccable Fleet
fleet.description: Modern and classic vehicles, maintained to the highest standards for your comfort and safety.

discretion.title: Absolute Discretion
discretion.description: Professionalism and confidentiality guaranteed for all our clients and services.

detail.title: Attention to Detail
detail.description: Each service is meticulously planned to exceed your expectations of luxury and efficiency.

punctuality.title: Swiss Punctuality
punctuality.description: Unwavering commitment to punctuality, ensuring you always arrive on time.

personalized.title: Personalized Service
personalized.description: We adapt to your specific needs, offering a tailor-made experience.

aiConcierge.greeting: Welcome to Dachs Limousines. How can I assist you with your exclusive experience?
aiConcierge.error: Sorry, an error has occurred. Please try again later.
aiConcierge.offerContact: If you wish, I can help arrange for our team to contact you for more personalized attention.

hero.title: Contact us for a personalized experience
hero.subtitle: We will be delighted to help you plan an unforgettable journey

map.title: Find Us
map.iframeTitle: Dachs Limousines Location on Google Maps

finalCta.title: Would you prefer us to contact you?

hero.title: Over 80 years of excellence on wheels
hero.subtitle: Pioneers in luxury chauffeur-driven car rental in Spain since 1940.

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: Since 1940, Dachs Limousines has set the standard for exclusive transport in Spain.
history.paragraph2: As one of the pioneering companies in chauffeur-driven car rental in Barcelona, we have accompanied generations of clients with an unwavering commitment to punctuality, elegance, and comfort.
history.paragraph3: Our fleet ranges from executive sedans to luxurious limousines, vans, minibuses, and coaches, all equipped to meet the expectations of those who demand the best.
history.paragraph4: Every detail has been meticulously cared for. With highly trained multilingual drivers, offering more than just a journey: a frictionless experience, with style and discretion.

cta.title: Ready to experience the next level of luxury transport?

sClass.alt: Black Mercedes S-Class from Dachs Limousines
sClass.name: Mercedes S-Class
sClass.description: The quintessential executive sedan. Luxury, comfort, and advanced technology for your most important journeys.

suv.alt: Black executive SUV from Dachs Limousines
suv.name: Executive SUV
suv.description: Space, versatility, and elegance. Ideal for small groups, families, or those seeking extra comfort and safety.

van.alt: Luxury Mercedes V-Class van from Dachs Limousines
van.name: Luxury Van (Mercedes V-Class)
van.description: Superior comfort for groups of up to 7 passengers. Perfect for team transfers, events, or VIP tourism.

classic.alt: Classic white limousine from Dachs Limousines for weddings
classic.name: Classic Cars and Limousines
classic.description: A touch of distinction for weddings, celebrations, and special events. Iconic vehicles for unforgettable moments.

football.title: Elite Football
football.description: Access to VIP boxes, exclusive stadium transfers, and gourmet dinners. Experience football like never before.

wineRoute.title: Wine and Gastronomy Routes
wineRoute.description: Discover prestigious wineries, private tastings, and Michelin-starred restaurants, all with a private chauffeur.

corporate.title: Premium Corporate Events
corporate.description: Impeccable logistics for conferences, high-level meetings, and roadshows. Your image, our priority.

hero.title: High-level mobility solutions for companies and events
hero.subtitle: Trust Dachs Limousines for premium transfers for congresses, weddings, corporate travel, and group logistics.

leadersSection.title: Leaders in premium mobility since 1940
leadersSection.paragraph1: At Dachs Limousines, we have been serving companies, institutions, and demanding clients for over 80 years.
leadersSection.paragraph2: Our experience allows us to offer complete solutions in premium mobility: from individual transfers to comprehensive logistics for events with hundreds of attendees, always guaranteeing punctuality, discretion, and maximum comfort.

services.heading: Services Designed for the Success of Your Event

corporate.title: Corporate Transfers
corporate.description: Airport, station, and hotel pickups for executives and teams. Punctuality and discretion guaranteed.

weddings.title: Dream Weddings
weddings.description: Limousines and high-end vehicles for brides, grooms, and guests. We take care of every detail for a perfect day.

congresses.title: Congresses and Fairs
congresses.description: Logistical transport management for large-scale events, with multilingual attention and on-site coordination.

vipTourism.title: VIP Tourism and Excursions
vipTourism.description: Personalized routes with multilingual chauffeurs to discover Barcelona and its surroundings with maximum comfort.

benefits.heading: A premium fleet, an impeccable experience
benefits.fleet: High-end fleet with Wi-Fi, climate control, and maximum discretion.
benefits.organization: Comprehensive organization of transfers for events of any size.
benefits.budgets: Adaptation to all types of clients and budgets with tailor-made solutions.
benefits.activeFor: Active service for companies, travel agencies, hotels, wedding planners, and event organizers.

finalCta.title: Organizing an event or need luxury executive mobility?

hero.title: Book your exclusive experience
hero.subtitle: Choose a date and one of our advisors will contact you to design a tailor-made service.

calendar.title: Select Your Date
calendar.confirmationNote: After completing your request, our team will review availability and contact you to confirm and personalize your reservation.

availability.success: Thank you. We have received your request for {city} on {date} for {pax} person(s). One of our advisors will contact you shortly to confirm availability and details.

support.title: Support and Alternative Contact
support.urgentContactIntro: For urgent inquiries or immediate assistance, please contact us at:
support.legalNotice: Reservations are subject to availability and manual confirmation by the Dachs Limousines team.

hero.title: VIP Concierge: Beyond transportation
hero.subtitle: We create unforgettable moments by adapting to the most exclusive desires of our clients.

regions.chinaDesc: Services adapted to Asian traditions and expectations.

experiences.title: Examples of personalized experiences
experiences.footballDesc: VIP boxes, gourmet dinners, private transfers.
experiences.wineOilDesc: Exclusive wineries, private tastings, reserved access.

cta.title: Request your VIP experience
cta.subtitle: Contact us to plan a tailor-made service, with no obligation.

exclusivity.title: Guaranteed Exclusivity
exclusivity.description: Premium services designed to offer a unique and memorable experience on every journey.

comfort.title: Maximum Comfort
comfort.description: Our high-end vehicle fleet ensures a pleasant and relaxed journey, with all amenities.

punctuality.title: British Punctuality
punctuality.description: Total commitment to agreed schedules, because your time is valuable to us.

personalizedAttention.title: Personalized Attention
personalizedAttention.description: We adapt to each client, offering a close relationship and tailor-made solutions for every need.

conciergeVip.imageAlt: Luxury concierge service in Barcelona by Dachs Limousines
conciergeVip.heading: VIP CONCIERGE
conciergeVip.description: Our VIP concierge service takes care of every detail. From reservations at exclusive restaurants and event tickets, to organizing private tours and unique cultural experiences. Allow our specialized team to design a tailor-made itinerary that reflects your tastes and exceeds your expectations. At Dachs Limousines, your satisfaction is our top priority.
